course_description: This course covers some of the essential computational methods frequently used in macroeconomics. At the end of this course, you will be able to solve and/or estimate most models that are widely used in macroeconomics.
prerequisites: ECON 510 and ECON 511 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3566, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10-11:15a, Instructor: J. Rubio Ramirez, Status: Open
